metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1831-1 -- Recommended update for blktrace
metadata.description:
This update for blktrace provides a fix for the following issue:
If two instances of blktrace are executed on the same device, one would fail to initialize and then tear down the devices it was configured to use, even when they weren't set up by that instance.
This could result in tearing down running traces, which would end up leaving the debugfs files around without a way to clean them up. Further instances of blktrace on that device would fail.
